title: Message Mate Texting Widget
shortDescription: Text with customers from your business phone number
longDescription:
Message Mate brings the power of texting to your business and website

Most customers hate phone calls and prefer to text. With Message Mate they can text your business. You or your employees can reply, saving time and enjoying higher customer satisfaction in the process

Benefits

* Texting saves time for your business and your customers

* 98% open rates of your messages (emails have only 30% open rates)

* Texting widget makes your website more mobile friendly

* Use our widget for customer support and reduce the phone load on you and your team

* Use our widget for lead generation and enjoy more leads reaching out

* Messages always come from your business number. Safer & more professional

* Searchable, documented, archivable messages you can always refer back to

* Off the charts customer satisfaction rates. Average customer satisfaction with texting is 8.3/10

Features

1. Text enable your business number. If you have a US/Canada landline, virtual number, or toll free number, we can make it textable. There is no change to your voice settings. 

2. Texts go to the channel of your choosing: email, helpdesk, web dashboard, and even cellphones 

3. No matter how you send the reply, customers get the message from your business number

4. Multiple responders can participate in the conversation and cover for each other

5. Initiate texts to remind customers of bills, appointments, or changes

6. Save customer groups and send a message to each group member with just one action

7. Texting widget that encourages reaching out via text instead of phone

8. Customize the widget to your brand colors and use case

9. Auto replies for off hours make sure customers can reach out anytime & get an answer

10. Templates to make responding even more efficient

11. Facebook Messenger integration. Respond to messages sent to your business page from anywhere. No need to log into Facebook

12. Integrations with Zendesk, Slack, Desk.com, HelpScout, FreshDesk, Avaya IPOCC, Google Tag Manager and more

Questions? Text or call us: 650-825-1166
instructions: If you'd like us to text enable your existing number, follow the regular app installation process. You'll get a temporary number until yours is text enabled (typically 3-5 days depending on your carrier).
author: Owner Listens Inc.

products.title: Message Mate Small Shop
products.shortDescription: For small teams & solo business owners
products.longDescription:
You have a small business and you need a way to effectively communicate with customers 
You want more customers but don't have time to waste on long phone calls and emails
You need to do everything from your phone, but you don't want your private number out there
You have 1-2 people on your team that also work with customers
You know customers prefer texting and will respond to you faster if you text them

This is the plan for you: 

* Text with up to 50 customers per month. Unlimited messages per customer
* Text enable your current business number or get a new number for texting
* Designate up to 3 users to handle customer messages 
* Receive and respond to messages from cellphones, emails, and web dashboard, while keeping your number private
* Create an automated response for after hours to give your team time off and set the right customer expectations
* Configure your Message Mate, a texting widget for your website that gets you more leads, especially from mobile visitors
* Connect your Facebook Messenger business account to respond to FB messages on the go
* Create your Facebook Messenger calling card (Messenger CTA)

products.title: Message Mate Growing Shop
products.shortDescription: For businesses with 1-3 support or sales reps
products.longDescription:
Your business is growing and you want to maintain high levels of service without a huge investment
You'd like to keep growing but need an easy way to handle inflows, vet customers, and close more business
You have a dedicated person or two for support and perhaps a few salespeople
Your customers prefer texting your business but you don't want to protect employee privacy and safety
You need a way to keep all customer communications within your business systems in case an employee leaves or you need to refer back to a past interaction

This is the plan for you: 

* Text with up to 100 customers per month. Unlimited messages per customer
* Text enable your current business number or get a new number for texting
* Designate up to 5 users to handle customer messages 
* Receive and respond to messages from cellphones, emails, and web dashboard, while keeping your number private
* Create up to 2 automated responses for after hours and weekends to set the right customer expectations
* Configure your Message Mate, a texting widget for your website that gets you more leads, especially from mobile visitors
* Connect your Facebook Messenger business account to respond to FB messages 
* Create up to 2 interactive Facebook Messenger responses (Messenger CTAs)

products.title: Message Mate Big Shop
products.longDescription:
You run a team of support or service agents
Texting with customers will make your agents more efficient and improve customer satisfaction
You need texting that is safe, scalable, and integrates with your existing tools 
You want all communications to come from your business number and stay in your business systems

This is the plan for you: 

* Text with up to 200 customers per month. Unlimited messages per customer
* Text enable your current business number or get a new number for texting
* Designate up to 10 users to handle customer messages 
* Receive and respond to messages from cellphones, emails, and web dashboard, while keeping your number private
* Integrate with helpdesk software or Slack
* Create unlimited automated responses for after hours, weekends, and holidays to set the right customer expectations
* Configure your Message Mate, a texting widget for your website that gets more customers to text you instead of calling your support line
* Connect your Facebook Messenger business account to respond to FB messages 
* Create up to 3 interactive Facebook Messenger responses (Messenger CTAs) 

Need an enterprise plan? CRM integrations? Chatbots? Contact us directly! 
Text or call: 650-825-1166

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

* Text enable your current business number or get a new number for texting
* Designate up to 3 users to handle customer messages 
* Receive and respond to messages from cellphones, emails, and web dashboard, while keeping your number private

products.title: Message Mate Growing Shop
products.shortDescription: For businesses with 1-3 support or sales reps
products.longDescription:
Your business is growing and you want to maintain high levels of service without a huge investment
You'd like to keep growing but need an easy way to handle inflows, vet customers, and close more business
You have a dedicated person or two for support and perhaps a few salespeople
Your customers prefer texting your business but you don't want to protect employee privacy and safety
You need a way to keep all customer communications within your business systems in case an employee leaves or you need to refer back to a past interaction

This is the plan for you: 

* Text with up to 100 customers per month. Unlimited messages per customer
* Text enable your current business number or get a new number for texting
* Designate up to 5 users to handle customer messages 
* Receive and respond to messages from cellphones, emails, and web dashboard, while keeping your number private
* Create up to 2 automated responses for after hours and weekends to set the right customer expectations
* Configure your Message Mate, a texting widget for your website that gets you more leads, especially from mobile visitors
* Connect your Facebook Messenger business account to respond to FB messages 
* Create up to 2 interactive Facebook Messenger responses (Messenger CTAs)

products.title: Message Mate Big Shop
products.longDescription:
You run a team of support or service agents
Texting with customers will make your agents more efficient and improve customer satisfaction
You need texting that is safe, scalable, and integrates with your existing tools 
You want all communications to come from your business number and stay in your business systems

This is the plan for you: 

* Text with up to 200 customers per month. Unlimited messages per customer
